name: ChartTitle
description: Represents a chart title object of a chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart title, which includes fill and font formatting.

properties.name: overlay
properties.description: Boolean value representing if the chart title will overlay the chart or not.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Represents the title text of a chart.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: A boolean value the represents the visibility of a chart title object.

properties.name: horizontalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the horizontal alignment for chart title.

properties.name: top
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the top edge of chart title to the top of chart area. Null if chart title is not visible.

properties.name: left
properties.description: Represents the distance, in points, from the left edge of chart title to the left edge of chart area. Null if chart title is not visible.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Returns the width, in points, of the chart title. Null if chart title is not visible.

properties.name: height
properties.description: Returns the height, in points, of the chart title. Null if chart title is not visible.

properties.name: verticalAlignment
properties.description: Represents the vertical alignment of chart title.

properties.name: textOrientation
properties.description: Represents the text orientation of chart title. The value should be an integer either from -90 to 90, or 180 for vertically-oriented text.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Represents the position of chart title.

properties.name: showShadow
properties.description: Represents a boolean value that determines if the chart title has a shadow.

methods.name: getSubstring
methods.description: Get the substring of a chart title. Line break '\n' also counts one character.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start position of substring to be retrieved. Position start with 0.

parameters.name: length
parameters.description: Length of substring to be retrieved.

methods.name: setFormula
methods.description: Sets a string value that represents the formula of chart title using A1-style notation.

parameters.name: formula
parameters.description: A string that represents the formula to set.
